Articles.Content: Every time you hear the developers talk about the game, you can tell they really care, makes me excited for the future of the game because they really want to make it right (and do right by the community, and modders too)
Excited for pretty much everything. The new UI looks great. Excited to see all the revamped planets/moons. Eventually interstellar. The Tutorials seem great.
Im most excited to see what this community can do when the kraken isnt around to smash up its creations. Cant wait to see the crazyness you are all going to create.
I'm excited for multiplayer - we can do the most when we do it together.
I know it won't be in at release, but I'm more excited to eventually have native KSP multiplayer than anything else!
I'm excited about all of it, but most of all, for in space construction!
I'm excited for the polish, new parts, good stock graphics, and cool explosions!
Im exited for the planet revamps, ive never really used graphics mods so it will be really new to me.
I cannot wait for interstellar, colonies, and just all the new features that'll run at 0.001 FPS on my 11 year old laptop!
I’m excited for the potential factory/automation/transportation type of gameplay that has been hinted at.

I'm excited for all the new parts and improved VAB, all the ships and planes shown in trailers look super cool. I'm also excited for all the bugfixes and refinements to the gameplay. KSP 1 is fun but it often feels like you have to fight the game too much.
I think I'm most excited currently for the revamped KSP 1 vibes. The QOL stuff we've seen as well as the graphic, sound, and gameplay improvements have my hype meter at an all time high!

I'm so exited about interstellar travel, even if that doesn't come in this version.

 

Edited February 22, 2023 by rominouuuuuuuu
I am excited for colonies, the other stuff on the roadmap, and modding. i wonder what the first mods for KSP2 will be

I am excited for the optimized game engine and internal mechanics that will hopefully allow higher part counts and better performance even in older PCs. 

I hope for more streamlined physics simulation algorithms, that are more stable, more performant, less endangered by the kraken.
I am super excited for colonies and space logistics
I am excited for the new VAB and for the new UI
Excited about how everything will look great without mods!
Axial tilt ... which hasn't been mentioned in ages but fingers crossed!
Can't wait for interstellar and the revamped graphics
I'm excited to finally show my daughters the "new little green men"
Landers that don't slide down the tiniest incline...
I'm really looking forward to the optimization to build space stations from hundreds of parts!
Excited for the new visuals, game looks really good in previews!
I am excited about the procedural Wings because I'm tired of having to make large wings out of small vaguely Wing shaped boards. I'm also looking forward to massive ion engines.
